name: automatic-claude-code
description: Automated loop runner for Claude Code - enables continuous AI-assisted development

scripts.dev:platform: concurrently "pnpm run dev:dashboard" "pnpm run dev:python" "pnpm run dev:hooks" --names "ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python,ðŸª Hooks" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow"
scripts.dev:platform:clean: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run dev:platform
scripts.dev:platform:debug: concurrently "pnpm run dev:dashboard:debug" "pnpm run dev:python:debug" "pnpm run dev:hooks" --names "ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python,ðŸª Hooks" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow"
scripts.dev:dashboard:debug: cd dual-agent-monitor && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=* pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:python: cd python-sdk && python -c "import claude_cli_wrapper; print('Python SDK ready')" && python -m http.server 8080 --directory .
scripts.dev:python:debug: cd python-sdk && cross-env PYTHONPATH=. python -m pdb claude_cli_wrapper.py
scripts.build:all: concurrently "pnpm run build" "pnpm run build:dashboard" "pnpm run build:python" --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python"
scripts.build:validate: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run typecheck:all && pnpm run lint:all
scripts.test:all: concurrently "pnpm run test" "pnpm run test:dashboard" "pnpm run test:python" --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python"
scripts.test:integration: jest --config jest.config.integration.js && cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run test:integration
scripts.test:e2e: jest --config jest.config.e2e.js && cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage:all: concurrently "pnpm run test:coverage" "cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run test:coverage" "cd python-sdk && python -m pytest --cov"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "pnpm run lint" "cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run lint" "cd python-sdk && flake8 ." --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python"
scripts.lint:fix: eslint src/**/*.ts --fix && cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run lint:fix && cd ../python-sdk && black . && isort .
scripts.typecheck:all: concurrently "pnpm run typecheck" "cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm run typecheck" --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard"
scripts.clean:all: concurrently "pnpm run clean" "cd dual-agent-monitor && rimraf dist" "cd python-sdk && rimraf build dist *.egg-info" --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python"
scripts.setup:dev: pnpm install && cd dual-agent-monitor && pnpm install && cd ../python-sdk && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
scripts.setup:complete: pnpm run setup:dev && pnpm run setup:env && pnpm run build:all
scripts.debug:dashboard: cd dual-agent-monitor && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect=9230" pnpm run dev
scripts.debug:all: concurrently "pnpm run debug:cli" "pnpm run debug:dashboard" "pnpm run debug:python" --names "ðŸ”§ CLI,ðŸŽ¨ Dashboard,ðŸ Python"
scripts.predeploy: pnpm run test:all && pnpm run build:validate
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.monitor:status: curl -s http://localhost:6007/health | json_pp || echo 'Monitor not running'
scripts.postinstall: pnpm run sdk:validate || echo 'SDK validation skipped'
